direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods are part of the Iterator interface and work together to manage the iteration over the NodeList.
The next() method directly depends on the item(int) method of the NodeList to retrieve the next Node.
The next() method indirectly depends on the getChildNodes() method to initialize the NodeList used for iteration.
Both methods override default Iterator behavior but have different implementations (one throws an exception, the other retrieves an element).
